title.rendered: 114 A Sweet Tactic for Black Friday

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 6:58 — 6.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

This tactic is pretty simple but can produce powerful results.
If you want more details, let me know in the comments and I’ll do detailed step by step instructions.

Watch A Classic Black Friday Tactic!
